doc.title: Carrie Nation Smashing a Saloon
doc.plot: This picture is based upon the much talked of exploits of Mrs. Carrie Nation in Kansas. The interior of a bar-room with its usual customers is shown. Mrs. Nation and her crusaders come in with their hatchets and proceed to demolish everything in sight. Mrs. Nation, however, knocks out the spigot from a beer barrel and is deluged by its contents.
